full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/26/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Ser OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS; FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, Nagendran Thampi residing at 11 Woodsedge Road , (Name) (Street and number) Audubon, Pennsylvania 19403 U.S.A. (City) (State) (ZIP Code, if in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on Feb. 9, 1931 at Trivandrum, India Also, answer either a. b or c, as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate. if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization NO 10646076 (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number 2. That I am 48 years of age and have resided in the United States since January, 1963 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 11 Woodsedge Rd., , Audubon, PA. 19403 COUNTRY MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO NAME SEX AGE OF BIRTH SINGLE DEPONENT N. Sankaranarayanan Nair M 77 India Widower Father 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of Medical Research with Norristown State Hosp. Scientist (Name of concern) at Norristown, Pa. 19401 and derive a net annual income of $ 34,700 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country $11,370 (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $ 10,000 (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $6,000 . market value, as indicated on (U.S. Savings attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real Bonds) estate at 11 Woodsedge Rd. valued at $70,000 , with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $ 38,000 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $55,000 cash surrender value of $ 5,000 (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See instructions for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) WHOLLY PARTIALLY NAME OF PERSON DEPENDENT DEPENDENT AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME Barbara H . Thampi X 34 Wife FOIA (b)(6) N. Sankaranarayanan Nair X 77 Father Form I-134 (Rev. 3-1-76)N
